songs.title: Bad Memories*
songs.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Swallow all these pills with my pride
Married to my highs, you may kiss the bride
Trouble in my brain, see it in my eyes
I got voices in my head, they keep me up at night
Said I was okay but I'm lying, feel like that I’m dying
Souls' screaming, crying, through my brain frying
Tryna numb the pain, all the drugs I've been buying
This oxy getting pricey, pour the codeine a hi-c
Blood red bling in the high seat
I’ve been doing so much wrong, even when my mom told me to do the right thing
Popping pills all night long, in the studio pouring up my feelings
Can't explain this feeling, kinda feels like I'm losing even though I'm winning

Chorus:
Drain out bad energy, Forget the bad memories
Drain out bad energy, Forget the bad memories

Verse 2:
Multi-Million Dollars, all mine from the start
Codeine kills the drama, and the drama in my heart
Just got a call from the dark side
Stab wounds in my chest but I'm all right
I miss my friends, I hate the spotlight
I love my girl, I hate the thot life
Yellow diamonds, shiny pearls
I'm trying to give her the world
I'm trying to show her the world
She ain't no ordinary girl
I know she know, I know she know I’m down and that
Life is an ocean demons have been drowning out
I watch the crowd crack a smile, I have a job to lead them out

Chorus:
Drain out bad energy, Forget the bad memories
Drain out bad energy, Forget the bad memories
